articles.title: NASA's astronauts aboard International Space Station set to return to Earth on SpaceX Dragon - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA's Crew 7, after a six-month stint on the International Space Station (ISS), is gearing up to return to Earth.
articles.content: NASA's Crew 7 mission is poised to conclude its six-month residency aboard the International Space Station (ISS), with seven astronauts preparing to return to Earth. Throughout their extended stay, t… [+2312 chars]

articles.title: Webb's Historic Discovery: The Farthest Active Supermassive Black Hole Ever Found - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The enigmatic galaxy GN-z11 is one of the youngest ever observed. Delivering on its promise to transform our understanding of the early universe, the James Webb Space Telescope is probing galaxies near the dawn of time. One of these is the exceptionally lumin…
articles.content: Researchers using the James Webb Space Telescope have made groundbreaking discoveries in galaxy GN-z11, which is one of the most distant and luminous galaxies known. They identified a supermassive bl… [+5930 chars]

articles.title: Tech News of the week: Smartphone launch spree, Apple-Epic Games battle, and more - The Indian Express
articles.description: Tech News of the week (Second week of March 2024): The first week of March was pretty busy in the world of smartphones, with new devices launching almost every day.
articles.content: Last week, we witnessed the launch of over five new smartphones in India, including the Xiaomi 14 Ultra, the first smartphone from the company that costs almost a lakh rupees. Similarly, Vivo also in… [+622 chars]
